summary: This code configures the global index URL for pip and installs packages from a specified URL, ensuring smooth installation of required packages for the microgrid base.

details.comment: This code configures the global index URL for pip and installs packages from a specified URL, ensuring smooth installation of required packages for the microgrid base.
details.content:
conda run -n cplex --live-stream --no-capture-output pip config set global.index-url https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple
conda run -n cplex --live-stream --no-capture-output pip install -i https://pypi.tuna.tsinghua.edu.cn/simple -r requirements.txt
